titlestmt.author: compiled by Carol King, Nancy Lyon, and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday January 8, 2019 at 09:17

did.unittitle: Namibia collection

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists primarily of printed material relating to political, economic, and social conditions in Namibia. Some photographs are included.

langmaterial.language: The material is in English, Afrikaans, and German.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the African Collection Curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Namibia Collection (MS 1534). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: African Collection, MS 605; Pamphlet Collection, MS 1351; African Postcard Collection, MS 1575. Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material in the original accession is arranged chronologically, with photographs last. Additions to the collection may vary in arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists primarily of printed material relating to political, economic, and social conditions in Namibia. Some photographs are included.

did.unittitle: Inventory
Transcript of diary of W. C. Palgrave, Special Commissioner, appointed by the Imperial Government to act as liaison with native chiefs
Ethnographic studies
"Okavango Reconnaissance": maps and diagrams of the Okavango River
"Water Supply in Owamboland": maps, diagrams
South West Africa People's Organization (SWAPO): newsletters, bulletins, pamphlets, documents
Assorted writings on Namibia, various and unidentified sources
American Committee on Africa (ACOA) and the Africa Fund: newsletters, pamphlets, printed materials
Tourism: maps, brochures
Episcopal Churchpeople for a Free Southern Africa (ECSA): newsletters, reports
National Convention of Namibia: constitutional proposals (announced by Clemens Kapuuo)
General information pamphlets; brochures; booklets
The Namibia Review , A Journal of Contemporary South West African Affairs, 1978-1980
Namibia National Front (NNF): newsletters, manifestos
PROSWA/Namibia Foundation: news bulletins, activity reports, printed materials
Afrikaans-Duitse Kultuurunie/Afrikaans-Deutsche Kulturgemeinschaft (ADK): booklets, reports
Writings on SWAPO, unidentified
United Nations: newsletters, statements, press releases, lectures
Namibian Christian Democratic Party (NCDP): program and aim
Namibia Support Committee: publications
SWAPO Democrats: releases and other documents
Democratic Turnhalle Alliance (DTA): manifestos, newsletters, pamphlets
Anti-Apartheid Movement and other related organizations: printed materials
Elections: printed material, pamphlets, registration forms
Interessengemeinschaft Deutschsprachiger Südwester (IG); Organization of German Speaking Southwesters: newsletters, brochures, reports
Campaign Against Namibian Uranium Contracts (CANUC) and materials from other anti-uranium movements
Government of the United States: congressional records and other documents concerning Namibia
SWA/Namibia Information Service, Division Liaison Services, Department of Governmental Affairs: statements, publications, news briefs
Newspapers
"Meeting on South West Africa/Namibia in Geneva," Department of Foreign Affairs and Information: information newsletter
Education/academic journals
The Labour Party: Statement by the National Executive Committee
Rössing Uranium Limited: newsletters, magazines
International Defense and Aid Fund for Southern Africa (IDAF): briefings, pamphlets
Human rights organizations: reports, printed materials
Washington Office on Africa: newsletters, releases, publications
Der Deutsch-Südafrikaner: newsletter
The Seventh Annual African Feast, The Black Vanguard Resource Center (BVRC): newsletter
SWAPO Youth League: bulletins and pamphlets
International Conference in Solidarity with the Struggle of the People of Namibia (and related material)
The Rio Tinto-Zinc Corporation: "The Alternative Report"
Swedish organizations: reports, printed materials
Namibia Support Committee: newsletters, reports, pamphlets
Worker/labor organizations: pamphlets, booklets, publications, printed materials
The American Society for the Defence of Tradition, Family, Property (TFP): position papers on SWAPO
"Namibian Independence: What is the Goal and How Can We Achieve It?," by Jariretundu Kozonguizi, Lincoln Review
Amnesty International: pamphlets, bulletins, letters
Feminist organizations: pamphlets, releases, literary journals
Nangoloh, Phil Ya, articles by and about
Namibia Communications Center: interviews, reports
"Children - Apartheid and Repression in Namibia," South Africa the Imprisoned Society (SATIS): seminar packet
South West Africa National Union (SWANU): newsletters
Tenth anniversary of Cassinga Day, memorial services
"The First Crisis of the Implementation of UNSCR 435/78 in Namibia," Radio Mozambique, External Service, Studio Discussion
Office of the Administrator General: press release
Literary journals
Namibia Peace Plan Study and Contact Group (NPP 435): press releases, pamphlets
Southern Africa Dossier, Centro de Estudos Africanos Universidade Eduardo Mondlane - Maputo República Popular de Moçambique: reports
International Freedom Foundation (UK)
Namibia Communications Centre: reports, printed materials
Namibia National Students' Organisation (NANSO): resolutions, newspapers
National Conference on Land Reform and the Land Question: Consensus Document
Institute of Current World Affairs: newsbriefs
"Business Opportunities in SWA/Namibia," published by First National Development Corporation of SWA Ltd.
The Federal Party of South West Africa: constitution, aims
Namibia Democratic Coalition: printed materials
Namibian National Democratic Party: election manifesto
Republikeinse Party: manifestos, printed materials
United Democratic Front (UDF): election manifesto
Owamba: photographs and brochures
